structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: The use for which the water is being withdrawn;
An identification of the water source from which the withdrawal is being made, in sufficient detail to describe the water source adequately;
The existing withdrawal; provided, however, that persons whose volume of withdrawals varies seasonally according to a substantially established pattern shall describe that variation;
Conservation measures instituted, or to be instituted, by the registrant; and
The point or points at which the water is to be discharged after use.
